thread.title: Peter “Urban Scot” McConnochie
thread.title_full: lastminute.com reviewed by Peter “Urban Scot” McConnochie

author: Peter “Urban Scot” McConnochie
title: Peter “Urban Scot” McConnochie
text:
Booking with Lastminute was a breeze, it was easy to book and make changes to suggested flights using the website.
Good range of options and hotels and it saved me scouring lots of other pages to find a decent few nights away.
